job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who craves autonomy, thrives on strategic decision-making, and wants to see your code transform lives, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life through AI, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing apps. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not looking for code monkeys or meeting enthusiasts. We're seeking a visionary engineer who can translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures. Someone who sees beyond the current sprint and shapes the long-term trajectory of our products. If you're ready to make your mark on the intersection of AI and education, let's talk.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect and implement groundbreaking features that push the boundaries of AI-powered education
     * Lead technical discussions, translating product visions into concrete, scalable solutions
     * Drive the evolution of our tech stack, ensuring it remains cutting-edge and efficient
     * Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technical capabilities with product goals

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Churning out code for short-term projects or chasing fleeting tech trends
     * Wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced projects with no real-world impact
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with tedious infrastructure issues
     * Following orders without the opportunity to influence product direction
     * Working on projects that don't leverage your full-stack expertise and strategic thinking, Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities that revolutionize how students learn and interact with educational content.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Full-Stack Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to architect the future of education? As a Senior Full-Stack Engineer at our cutting-edge EdTech company, you'll be the driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms that are revolutionizing how students engage with knowledge. If you're a technical virtuoso who craves autonomy, thrives on strategic decision-making, and wants to see your code transform lives, this is your stage.

   Imagine bringing historical figures to life through AI, crafting personalized magical stories that boost comprehension, or developing an AI learning copilot that integrates seamlessly with existing apps. These aren't just ideas - they're our products, and you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution.

   We're not looking for code monkeys or meeting enthusiasts. We're seeking a visionary engineer who can translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures. Someone who sees beyond the current sprint and shapes the long-term trajectory of our products. If you're ready to make your mark on the intersection of AI and education, let's talk.

   What you will be doing

     * Architect and implement groundbreaking features that push the boundaries of AI-powered education
     * Lead technical discussions, translating product visions into concrete, scalable solutions
     * Drive the evolution of our tech stack, ensuring it remains cutting-edge and efficient
     * Make high-stakes technical decisions that directly impact user experiences and product scalability
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technical capabilities with product goals

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Churning out code for short-term projects or chasing fleeting tech trends
     * Wasting time on internal IT systems or outsourced projects with no real-world impact
     * Getting bogged down in endless meetings or wrestling with tedious infrastructure issues
     * Following orders without the opportunity to influence product direction
     * Working on projects that don't leverage your full-stack expertise and strategic thinking, Transform our visionary EdTech concepts into robust, scalable realities that revolutionize how students learn and interact with educational content.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on software development and architectural design within an EdTech context, leveraging AI concepts. However, it lacks specific details about core AI/ML tasks such as model training, fine-tuning, data engineering, or MLOps. The emphasis is on building applications *around* AI-powered features rather than developing the AI models themselves. The role is described as 'Senior Full-Stack Engineer' and the responsibilities lean towards traditional software engineering with an AI flavor, rather than a specialized AI/ML role. It doesn't fit the core definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer, and it's not a technical AI role in the sense of building or deeply understanding the underlying AI models. Therefore, 'Ambiguous' is the most appropriate classification as it primarily focuses on the use of AI tools to enhance productivity and product features, rather than the development or deep specialization in AI/ML itself.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'architect and implement groundbreaking features', 'translate product visions into concrete, scalable solutions', 'drive the evolution of our tech stack', 'make high-stakes technical decisions', and 'collaborate with cross-functional teams to align technical capabilities with product goals'. These are core software development and architectural responsibilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Architect and implement groundbreaking features that push the boundaries of AI-powered education

job_tasks.justification: The role involves translating high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures and making technical decisions that impact user experience and scalability, which are key aspects of software architecture and development.
job_tasks.phrase: translate high-level concepts into robust, scalable architectures

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'you'll be at the helm of their technical evolution' and 'shapes the long-term trajectory of our products', indicating a strong focus on the development and strategic direction of the software products.
job_tasks.phrase: shapes the long-term trajectory of our products

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'align technical capabilities with product goals' indicates a need to understand the business objectives and ensure technical work supports them.
job_tasks.phrase: align technical capabilities with product goals

job_tasks.justification: The role is described as 'Senior Full-Stack Engineer' and mentions 'full-stack expertise', directly pointing to software development responsibilities.

soft_skills.phrase: driving force behind AI-powered learning platforms
wants to see your code transform lives
at the helm of their technical evolution
